Posts.EditableText:
"[b:36riuyba]Kurri Ming[/b:36riuyba]"

 A lot shorter then other games by Slackers Inc, [b:36riuyba]Kurri Ming[/b:36riuyba] still packs a punch. A simple [b:36riuyba]get out of the house[/b:36riuyba] game in which you'll need to play as different characters to archive the end goal. 

URL:
[url:36riuyba]http://www.textadventures.co.uk/review/388/[/url:36riuyba]

Note: 
When using the play online feature, to switch characters you'll need to type in the command [b:36riuyba]Switch Character[/b:36riuyba] to switch between [b:36riuyba]Kurri[/b:36riuyba] and [b:36riuyba]Kuroda[/b:36riuyba].
Posts.HTML:
"Kurri Ming"

A lot shorter then other games by Slackers Inc, Kurri Ming still packs a punch. A simple get out of the house game in which you'll need to play as different characters to archive the end goal.

URL:
http://www.textadventures.co.uk/review/388/

Note:
When using the play online feature, to switch characters you'll need to type in the command Switch Character to switch between Kurri and Kuroda
